maintainer.description: CC me on the bugs so I can take a look at them. I actually use this software and I know how it is supposed to work, at least partially.

use.flag: Build support for Apple's AppleTalk (DDP) protocol and its utilities (atalkd, timelord, papd).
Add support for net-print/cups printers in papd. This flag is only considered if appletalk USE flag is enabled, and is otherwise ignored.
Add support for user quota on various filesystems.
Use dev-libs/openssl to provide DHX User Access Modules. These are not used with most recent versions of OS X and can be kept disabled without risks.
